plot_events.plot: At McLarens, Zoey dares Marshall to send a picture of his junk to an anonymous person. Robin calls for everyone to shout out random numbers to which "The Blitz" Jorge Garcia responds with 4 8 15 16 23 24, which were the numbers that Jorge Garcia's character, Hurley, discovers on Lost.
The character name of the original Blitz is Matt Blitz. Matthew Blitz is one of the production staff for the show.

The method by which the curse of the 'Blitz' is passed from one person to another (a trail of mist going to and from the mouth) is a visual in-joke to the Buffy episode Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Hush were people magically lose their voices in an identical manner.
The character name of the original Blitz is Matt Blitz. Matthew Blitz is one of the production staff for the show.

name: How I Met Your Mother: Blitzgiving (S06E10)

role_events.blurb: What? No! You can't go now. It's the night before Thanksgiving. College chicks are back in town. Their moms just made a snide comment about the weight they gained. They called her a bitch, but deep down, they know she's right. And they're about to walk through that door, where we will be waiting with some light beer and some rock hard approval. Wh-what u-up?
...To me.
And then I'm just going to leave her there... buck-naked, covered in candle wax, tied to the bed.
Wait... Ted doesn't like that girl?
It was legen-- wait for Ted to leave, 'cause he's now The Blitz-- -- dary. Legendary!
Well, not anymore, Blitz.
Hey, Robin, you should dance on the oven.
Full disclosure. We also used all your butter, greasing up Lily so we could see how far we could slide her down the hall.
Huh. I should probably disconnect the gas.
Um... Um... I'm have... I'm having trouble breathing!
And here's the twist, Babaka. Because Ted left early, he's now The Blitz.
No. I c... Because... Step on it.
But he's The Blitz.
Oh, God, no!
Sure. But... no one move while I'm gone. : I'm scared.
Thanks. You're the only one who's nice to me about this.
What happened?
Aw, man! You said I could leave the room!
No! Y-You... Robin, Robin. I will pay you to be The Blitz. $100! No-- $10,000. No-- 60 bucks. That's a lot of money for sur-caret diamond your 53-year-old husband bought you.

I'm not any Blitz! You're The Blitz! You're all The Blitz! I slept with that cute ys, despite the wit and wisdom of Wang Guy, Zoey and I are never going to be friends. We're just here for her oven and that's it.
Aw, man! Wait. Which half?
What happened? I saw it!
Thank you, God!
Kids, in the fall of 2010, I was hosting my very first Thanksgiving. And I wanted it to be unforgettable.
Blitz was a guy we knew in college. Sadly, he was cursed.
You see, every time Blitz left a place, something amazing happened.
And over the years, "The Curse of The Blitz" continued.

Kids, I'd live to regret those words. You see, the "Curse of Blitz" could be passed from one person to the next, at any moment. Blitz had gotten the curse from Jerry Windheim, back in freshman year, who got it years before that from Davey Beaterman. The original Blitz, Matt Blitz, was a guy who went to Wesleyan back in the '60s. He dropped out right before the school went co-ed. And then, Thanksgiving morning...
Kids, you remember Zoey. For the last two months, she'd been making my life hell.
And then the cab driver said the last thing any of us wanted to hear.
And just as Barney looked away, it happened.
My Blitzy lies over the ocean; My Blitzy lies over the sea; My Blitzy lies over the ocean; So bring back my Blitzy...
Well... I'm calling it a little early.
Nah, it's Kraft/Croft night: mac and cheese and Tomb Raider. Biz-zow!
Aw, man!
Aw, man!
Aw, man!
Well, I'm gonna call it. I just got Madden 2K1, and I can't stop thinking about it.
Aw, man!
The Gentleman!
Oh, I was there for the whole thing. Something inside me just said "Grand Theft Auto" can wait a night.

I'm finally free! I mean, you have no idea what I've missed all these years: The university president's toupee being snatched by a hawk at graduation, Zeppelin reuniting at my cousin Ira's bar mitzvah, countless nip-slips, crotch shots, shooting stars and double rainbows. I've missed them all!
My name's not Blitz. My name is Steve! Colors seem so bright now. Thank you, Blitz.
Yeah. You don't want to bail early, man. You could become The Blitz.
Yeah. Remember how last week we fired up a sandwich, and we listened to Pink Floyd's Dark Side of the Moon while watching The Wizard of Oz?
We'll see what happens.
Completely naked!
And the movie was awesome.
Free beer for everyone!
You know what? Ted, go ahead-- leave early to do something lame. Just don't blame us if you become... The Blitz.
Barney, I know that Ted doesn't like that girl, but that's a little extreme.
Okay, awesome. Well, Lily doesn't let me do truths. So, dare.
Best idea ever!
Worst idea ever! My junk ended up in some stranger's pocket. If there phone was on vibrate, I basically dry-humped them.
I'm afraid you are, Ted. You see, when you left last night, you changed the course of Blitztory.
Hey, just so you guys know, there was a tiny explosion at the sewage treatment plant across the street from our apartment, but I'm sure it's fine by now.
Guys? Wait a minute. Where's Barney?
You missed it.
Life moves pretty fast, Barney. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you might miss it.
Oh, God, that is disgusting!
No... no, Ted. Random number guy just sent me his wang back.
Dude, you walked out of the room, the laws of physics stopped and the laws of awesome tripled.
Oh, look. We got an answer. Here it is. "Yes, enemies can become friends. "Remember what Gandhi said. 'Be the change you want to see in the world.'"
Instead of stuffing, I'm going to fill the turkey with... a slightly smaller turkey. It's called a Turturkeykey!
Your loss. All right, it's dead in here. I'm gonna call it a little early.
Wh... you sure? We got big plans.
Well, tonight, we're doing the same thing, only with "Weird Al" Yankovic's Greatest Hits and Apocalypse Now.
Completely naked!
At the exact moment Brando first appeared, "Weird Al" launched right into "Eat It."
Free beer for everyone!
All right, first of all... there's nothing lame about brining a Turturkeykey, copyright pending. And secondly, I don't believe "The Curse of The Blitz" is real.
What the hell happened here?
Aw, man! No, no! Let's get one thing straight, okay? I am not The Blitz.
Please stop. Okay, fine.
Wait! Wait! Wait! What's that? What's "The Gentleman"?
I'm not The Blitz!  Zoey?
How could you, my best friends in the world, hang out with my mortal enemy, then let her sleep in the tub where I clean myself?!
I'm not The Blitz!
Finish the story, Red.
I missed a skateboarding dog?
It wasn't?
Wait. Blitz was there, too?
I'm not The Blitz!

What? No! N- n-n-n-no! N-n-no! I'm not The Blitz! The only thing I missed last night was my best friends stabbing me in the back by hanging out with my worst enemy. Guys! I hate Zoey! That means you're supposed to hate her, too! Th-that's your rule, Lily!
Tried?! Lily, do you have any idea how many people I've blindly hated for you? I hated Renée Zellweger with a burning passion for eight years, only to discover you meant Reese Witherspoon!
That's Kate Hudson!

No, we hate Zoey! I'm so furious at you all right now, but it's Thanksgiving, and I have a Turturkeykey to make. And not that I'm The Blitz, but could everyone please come with me into the kitchen?  Okay, I'm, uh, just gonna preheat the oven.
Great. So not only did you guys betray me, but you broke my oven on Thanksgiving?
It doesn't help. 4G? No. What-What are we supposed to do now?
Barney, I don't know if the oven is deep enough. Plus, it's a display made of cardboard.
It's not awesome!
No. Absolutely not.
No. I'm not The Blitz. I'm The Bueller. You know what this means. You're The Blitz.
Chicka-chicka!
Zoey.
Okay, the Turturkeykey is officially cooking.
Okay, guys, that's starting to hurt.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a turturkeykey to baste.
No... I baste alone.
Who canceled? Your coven?
Are you happy? You're ruining Thanksgiving.
Oh... I'm sorry, Lily. I'm just never going to like td: Who are we gonna...
Really? Wang Guy? We're asking Wang Guy?
Oh, my God!
What? No. It was an accident.
Oh, great. Real mature.
I guess we're going home.
Lily, where'd you get that?
And if Zoey is a cartoon character, she's Cinderella's evil stepmother!
Barney let us in.
Look, I'm sorry your stepdaughter didn't want to spend Thanksgiving with you.
I just do. It must be tough.
I get that. Uh, you should hang on to this. You can give it to her next year.
Hey, you never know. People don't stay enemies forever.
The Gentleman!
The Gentle...
The Gentleman!
The Gentleman!
The Gentleman!
Did they tell you about the skateboarding dog? It was awesome!
This is awesome! I'm part of this!
This is awesome!
Mom keeps an extra litter box in here. There you go. Good as new. Oh. Hey, Ginger.
Oh, my goodness. Our cab took a wrong turn. We were in the Thanksgiving Day parade!
You're safe. It's okay to leave the room. You have to actually leave the building for something cool to happen.
Okay, I got to test this.
I just wanted to see something cool happen. I'm sorry. But I was on that island for what seems like eternity. I'm going to enjoy things on the other side.
Facial!
Word play. Loving it.
Coven. Group of witches.
Oh! Serve returned.
God, I'm so happy to be here. My face hurts from smiling.
Uh, did Wang Guy just quote Gandhi?
Come on, man. Don't be that Blitz.
Oops. We forgot to light the candles.
Aw, come on, Blitz. Now it's just sad. Aw, man. Oh, go ahead. I forgot my jacket.
Tap's broke! Can't turn 'em off! Free beer for everyone!
But Barney, now you left the group. Wouldn't that put you in danger of becoming The Blitz yourself?
Oh! I'm sorry. I thought this was my room.
Oh, hold the door!
That is amazing. And I was here for it. Now Zoey is The Blitz. Ha, ha!  Burn on her.
Where to?
Yeah. I don't know where that is.
Make out with Zoey! Make out with Zoey! Make out...
Morning, Blitz!
Thanks, guys! Last night was amazing! The Gentleman!
Can I... help you?
You're Lily Aldrin? The painter?!
You're amazing! I bought a bunch of your paintings online.
Yeah.
Okay, Marshall. Truth or dare?
Okay. I dare you to send a picture of your junk to a complete stranger.
Okay. Everybody shout out random numbers.
And... send!
Hey, you guys should come to my house for Thanksgiving. My husband always spends it with his daughter, so I'm going to be alone anyway.
It's Thanksgiving. What the hell?
Happy Thanksgiving! Ted.
Barney, could you get me some more ice?
I'm coming with you.
Oh, I'm sure you're a master baster, Ted.
But relax. I've got a ton of sides to heat up since my plans fell through.
Yeah. They were worn out from putting that spell on your hair.
Well, you're not exactly who I thought I'd be spending Thanksgiving with, either.
Did you do that on purpose?
Oh, yeah. Well, like this is.
Yeah, well, you started it.

Hey, you guys should come to my house for Thanksgiving. My husband always spends it with his daughter, so I'm going to be alone, anyway. Well, you're not exactly who I thought I'd be spending Thanksgiving with, either.
Get out! All of you, out!
Barney was here? I was walking around half-naked.
How do you know that?
It was the first Thanksgiving Hannah agreed to spend with me, and then at the last minute she changed her mind. She hates my guts.
Yeah... Right. Next year.
A Turturkeykey?
The Gentleman!
Oh, you had to be there, Blitz. Yes.
Sorry, Ted. We can explain. After you Blitzed out last night...
Oh, my God... That's Zoey! That's Ted's enemy. Which means she's our enemy. Let's take this bitch down.
Huh? Huh? Who's got your back? Now let's have dinner!
Okay, well, we all started brainstorming ways to mess with her. There were a lot of different ideas kicking around.
Okay. Wh...? Well, I got it. You see that silk scarf? I'm going to steal it.
Yeah. Yeah! My name is Lily Aldrin. I'm a friend of Ted Mosby's, so you better...
Well, yeah.
That was you?!
Oh! Thanks!
And then, the craziest thing happened.
Yeah, but that wasn't the crazy part.
I tried.
Hey, I will hate her until I get my money back for You, Me and Dupree!
Oh, yeah. That's who I hate. Guys, we hate Kate Hudson.
But if it helps, I reached 4G.
Ted, you're not gonna like this, but we do have one other option.
Could we bring Ted?
Come on. Give her a chance.
Best friend alert!
It's a boom-a-wang.
Thank you.
You missed it!
Aww. You've got a little crush on Wang Guy, don't you?
Just stop it! God,ed to me in that other roo... Aw, man.
I don't get it. Why'd she just kick us out like that?
Oh. When Zoey booted us, it made me want to steal something of hers again. Apartment full of designer labels, and what do I grab? "Happy Turkey Day, Hannah. Love, Zoey." I wonder who Hannah is.
Yeah, I was there for the "insertion." He used shoehorns. I'll be having sides.
Hey! Morning, Blitz!
Look, none of us meant for it to happen, but, well, we had an awesome night with her.
The oven.
I think the smaller turkey just tried to crawl further inside the bigger turkey.
Ted, you violated a dead turkey with another dead turkey. Don't let that be in vain.
Tony Bennett passed Ted the mike and he sang "Twist and Shout!"
Wow. You sent a wang out, and you got a wang back.
Nice.
No, I meant the wang.
"Dear Wang Guy...Can enemies ever be friends? Just wondering."
He's bold and uninhibited, so why not? And guys, you know what? For fun, why don't we ask him what he does for a living? Wouldn't that be fun? Just ask...
What? No. Shut up. I hate him.
Blitz...
Blitz...
Blitz.
